version_description:
1. Fixed the bug that the game will totally go black after device restarted.
2. Fixed a bug occurred by the permanent Decree.
3. Fixed the bug that the dead Teammate cannot be found in the summoning map.
4. Fixed a bug when Inventory full.
5. Adjusted some of the mission rewards.

1. Added two activities including Check-In & advertising rewards.
2. Added a map with more resources and a map with more experiences.
3. Reduced the consumption of Gold while Repairing equipment, Upgrading equipments, upgrading workers, upgrading skills, upgradeing heroes and healing teammates.
4. Reduced the consumption of Gem while unlocking more Bag columns, unlocking more Inventory columnsand and healing teammates..
5. Added function of Quick Healing, so you can go back to fight quickly.
6. Added function of Forbidden Skills. All heroes are forbidden to release their skills.
7. Heroes could cast the HP & MP skills rightly now.
8. Tokens are shared by all characters now. (You need to use every character once for Token adding together).
9. Increased items dropping when boss killed.
10. The capacity of Inventory increased to 54.
11. You could easily find the map which can challenge repeatedly now.
12. Fixed a bug caused by entering game with Ranger after purchasing her.
13. Teammates could be resurrected directly in Town.
14. Fixed a bug that some item couldn't be picked up in SpecialLand.
15. Added function of Sweep. (Unlocked after every repeatable map finished.)
16. Increased effect of passive skill of some heroes.
17. Added role ability introduction.
18. Increased ability of Ice-KingSuit and fixed an equipment ability bug.
19. You could view infomation of some IAP packages.
20. Fixed a bug of Travler Sword which MoveSpeed was invalid.
21. Displayed the infomation including next reward time after purchasing Decrees.
22. Added function of Auto Fighting. (unlocked in map 2-1).
23. Added function of Sell Column expansion.

1. Optimized Automatic Fight. Roles can pick up items and open the shadow correctly now.
2. Added function of QuickRepair & QuickDecompose.
3. Optimized automatic sales. Equipments can be sold automaticly after Sweeping or back to Town. (Set in SaleStrategy)
4. Added equipment locking function. Locked equipment cannot be decomposed, discarded or sold.
5. Added function of prohibiting automatic sale in each Station.
6. Offline reward calculation optimization to prevent interface jam.
7. Sweep consumption calculation correction.
8. Adjust drop rate of BluePrints & some equipments.
9. Display Stations' & Workers' names and level, and you can also hide them in Setting.
10. Added error monitoring.
11. Other bug fixed.

1. Fixed a bug of black screen that is easy to appear when entering another map.
2. Check-In changed to reset on the 1st of each month.
4. Fixed a bug where QuickRepair couldn't repair locked equipments.
5. Equipment prices and Sweeping bonus adjusted.
6. Other bug fixed.

1. Significantly increase price of equipments.
2. You can enter repeat-map for free now.
3. Drop rate increased.
4. QuickRepair will select all equipment by default.
5. Other bug fixed.

1. Optimized logic of automatic fight.
2. Adjusted the effect of Life Totem and Puppet Sculpture.
3. Remaining numbers of enemies will be shown.
4. Reduced the boss damage after Map 3-1.
5. Adjusted synthetic formula of SpecialLandScroll and GodScroll.
6. Other bug fixed.

After almost a month, we bring you this big update.

1. Added 2 Characters, 3 heroes and 1 teammate.
2. Added Friendship and Career system, each role has an independent career route.
3. Added Achievement system.
4. Added 46 kinds of equipments, and a new Composing system for special equipments.
5. Added 3 kinds of token items.
6. Added 8 chapters. The map has reached 16 chapters or 91 sections.
7. Added 12 sets of device skins.
8. Added employee ability and fighting events.
9, added a variety of Town Events.
10. Added equipment Collections and redesigned the use of blueprints.
11, Hero's equipment column could be fully opened.
12, adjusted Teammate, which is no longer a useless existence.
13. Improved the upper limit of level of Characters, Heroes, and Teammates.
14, Adjusted lots of things for a more balanced and funny game.
15. Known bug fixed.

1. Reduced the difficulty of some maps.
2. Solved the problem that certain skills are not released.
3. Increased drop rates of items.
4. Added automatic using of HP bottles and MP bottles.

1. Fixed the black screen bug of IOS9.
2. Increased the warehouse column to 12, and expand the capacity of each column to 72 grids.
3. Equipments are sorted by suit in Inventory now.
4. Added a reset function in repeatable maps.
5. When automatic fighting over, character would automatically run back to the starting point.
6. Teammate would teleport to character after a certain distance.
7. You could use all blueprints in Collections now.

1. Adjusted the first charge rewards.
2. Token item adjusted.
3. Adjusted the interface when character defeated.
4. You can use summon scrolls easily now.
5. Added settings: hiding skill effects, trading tips and equipments obtained tips.
6. Skill of Mage adjusted.
7. Unselected heroes and teammates can be purchased directly by gems now.
8. Other known bug fixed.

1. Adjusted drop rate of gems in summoned maps.
2. Known bugs fixed.

1. Fixed a bug caused when viewing info of Eye of Power.
2, Equipments could be automatically sold after opening Chests according to sale strategy.
3. Fixed a bug that causing map props invisibly.
4, The skill Holy Spirit would only restore mana to hero whose mana less than 30%.
5. Fixed the abnormal level of challenger in town event.

1. Eight chapters added.
2. More rewards from Decrees.
3. More rewards from daily sharing.
4. Optimized the map selection logic.
5, Added a guidance of equipment Collection.
6. Known bugs fixed.

1. Fixed the wrong boss level after 16th chapter.
2. Fixed a skill releasing problem after character resurrection.
3. Added automatic decomposition in sales strategy.
4. Equipment sorting optimized.
5. Equipment could be locked in info view.
6. Fixed a character recover bug in choosing view.
Fixed known bugs.

1. All characters can receive first charge reward now.
2. Known bugs fixed.

1. Added 2 kinds of difficulty, and the adventure map increased to 72.
2. Added the world Boss and you could challenge them every week.
3. Added Endless Abyss, with unlimited levels.
4, Added Mosaic function in Forge, set gems to equipments to create the best artifact.
5. Added a place of Treasures to try your LUCK.
6, The Hradec square added to Main city. Characters could transfer items now.
7. Added 4 sets of character-exclusive-sets.
8. Added 2 new Token props.

1. Fixed the problem of black screen in Map 5-5. 
2. Fixed the problem that the difficult maps could not be unlocked.

1. Upgraded the game engine to solve game fever, power consumption and performance issues. (Note: ios 9 and below is no longer supported.)
2. Added Tower of Evils unlocked at 4-1 in HARD mode.
3. Added a place to WISH for the desired items.
4. Added Special Forge where you could refine equipments.
5. Added the attribute sorting function.
6. Added a new ability named HolyDamage.
7. Adjusted the way of obtaining Hero Alkin.
8. Sharing to wechate is ok now.
9. Improved the effect of Book of elements and Chaotic stone.
10. Other bugs Fixed.

1. Fixed the bug that new character will get stuck in the beginning guide.
2. Other bug fixed.

1. Fixed the crash when fighting in map for about ten minutes.
2. Fixed the stuck problem after switching game from background.
3. Other bug fixed.

1. Added SuitRebirth function in Special Forge.
2. Fixed some crash problems.
3. Other bugs fixed.

1. Fixed the bug that ads rewards could not obtained .
2. Fixed the problem that equipments details pop up automatically.
